commonly used in industry one is called preventive maintenance and the second is predictive maintenance so preventive
maintenance is more around when you to maintenance on a regular basis on your
equipment or asset for example our vehicle or car we do regular service
right even if there is no problem with the bitte car we are driving or the vehicle we are driving we do a regular
service on the car so that it doesn't stuck anywhere right so that's more of a
preventive maintenance so we are keeping it in a good condition so that it does
not create any problem while predictive maintenance on the other hand is based upon the important statistics from the
assets we monitored important statistics of the asset or device on a regular
basis and if there is any anomaly detected for example the monitor data is
outside a range then we assume that it's going to create problem in very near
future and then only we plan for maintenance so predictive maintenance is based upon the monitored data we monitor
